name: Mithril
description: Mithril (MITH) is a decentralized social media platform on the Ethereum Blockchain that rewards users for creating content. The team plans to partner existing social platforms to drive adoption of its ERC-20 MITH token, which can reportedly be integrated with any social media platform. In addition to storing funds, the Mithril Vault wallet can be used for staking and swapping into other currencies.
